title: Chord Diagram
sourceText: Moving Between/Within US Regions in 2020 - US Census
schema:
const relationalData = [
  [A_A, A_B, A_C, A_D, A_E, A_F, A_G, A_H], 
  [B_A, B_B, B_C, B_D, B_E, B_F, B_G, B_H],
  [C_A, C_B, C_C, C_D, C_E, C_F, C_G, C_H],
  [D_A, D_B, D_C, D_D, D_E, D_F, D_G, D_H],
  [E_A, E_B, E_C, E_D, E_E, E_F, E_G, E_H],
  [F_A, F_B, F_C, F_D, F_E, F_F, F_G, F_H],
  [G_A, G_B, G_C, G_D, G_E, G_F, G_G, G_H],
  [H_A, H_B, H_C, H_D, H_E, H_F, H_G, H_H],
  //insert additional inter-relational matrixed data..."
];

properties.description: The margin top, bottom, left, right margin offset relative to the radius.
The outer width of the chart, in pixels.
The thickness of the color band representing each dataset.
The label font size relative to 1% of the width of the viewport.
The chart label tick spread factor.
The format specifier string for the scale ticks.
The section labels for each dataset.
The fill colors for each section.  The length of colors MUST match names variable array.
The opacity for the charts overall chords.
The opacity of non-select chart elements.
The opacity of select chart elements.
The background color of the tooltip.
The text color of the tooltip.
